action.createMindMapInsertToMd: Create new mind map and insert into current document
action.insertCodeBlockToMd: Insert mind map code block into current document

tip.fileIsNotMd: Current file is not a markdown document
tip.onlyEnableSelectCurrentVaultFile: Only files from the current vault can be added
tip.integerInputError: Please enter a number greater than 0
tip.pluginNewVersion: A new version of the plugin is available:
tip.pluginNoNewVersion: The current version is already the latest version
tip.mdToMindMapFail: Conversion failed, unable to parse data that can be converted into a mind map
tip.mdModifyTip: Do not modify any information except YAML
tip.fileNameEmpty: The file name cannot be empty
tip.fileNameIllegal: The file name contains illegal characters
tip.mindMapToMdTip: After converting to a Markdown document, only some content will be retained, such as node text, summary text, notes, etc. Other content will be discarded and cannot be recovered. Please make a backup first.
tip.mdToMindMapTip: Only supports converting syntax such as titles and lists into mind maps. Other content will be discarded and cannot be recovered. Please make a backup first.

theme.title: Default theme (light color)
theme.desc: Default theme for creating a mind map file in light color mode
theme.desc2: Default theme for creating a mind map file in dark mode

layout.title: Default layout
layout.desc: The default structure when creating a new mind map file

folder.desc4: Storage location for newly created SimpleMindMap files
folder.desc1: Custom file storage directory, relative to vault root directory
folder.desc5: Storage location for uploaded image files (node images, background images)
folder.desc2: Custom image storage directory, relative to vault root directory
folder.desc6: Custom subfolder, relative to current file's folder
folder.desc7: Storage directory for local files selected in node hyperlinks
folder.desc3: Custom file storage directory, relative to vault root directory
folder.option4: Specified subfolder under current file's folder
folder.desc8: Mind map data is stored after encoding and compression, so it cannot be searched in OB. If you want to search for the node text content of the mind map in OB, you can turn on this option. After turning it on, the text content of all nodes will be saved in the file for search. The side effect is that it will cause the file size to increase, which may affect the speed of file opening and saving
folder.title9: Store canvas position and scaling data
folder.desc9: After opening, the canvas position and zoom data will be saved in the file, so that the next time it is opened, it can be restored to the position and zoom state when it was closed last time. The disadvantage is that moving and scaling the canvas will cause file changes
folder.title10: The maximum level for converting node text to Markdown titles
folder.desc10: Nodes with text less than or equal to this level will be converted to Markdown titles, while the rest will be converted to unordered lists

compress.desc1: Whether to compress uploaded node images (locally selected images)
compress.desc2: Set the maximum width after image compression
compress.desc3: Set the maximum height after image compression
compress.desc4: The quality of compressed images is only valid for certain image formats, such as jpg

codeBlock.title: Code block initial height
codeBlock.desc: Initial height when embedding via smm code block (pixels)
codeBlock.desc2: Whether the background of the embedded smm code block is transparent, otherwise it will follow the selected mind map theme background color

embed.title1: Embed preview double click to open a new tab
embed.desc1: When embedding an MD document in format ![[]], double-click to preview the image and open the file in a new tab
embed.desc2: Is the background of the preview image embedded in the format of ![[]] transparent
embed.title3: Is the embedded image stored as a separate file
embed.desc3: By default, images used for embedding preview in ![[]] format will be stored separately in the repository as SVG files. This way, only the file path is stored in the mind map file, which can significantly reduce the file size and speed up file reading and saving. If closed, the image data will be stored in the mind map file, and the volume will significantly increase
embed.desc4: The folder where the embedded preview image files are stored should not be empty relative to the repository root directory, and the directory should start with . as the hidden folder
embed.desc5: Does clicking on the inserted node link (excluding network links) open in a new tab. After closing, you can also open a new tab by pressing Ctrl+left mouse button

file.title1: File name format for creating a new mind map
file.desc1: Naming format for creating a new mind map file name. Support variables other than notename
file.desc3: Naming format for images pasted on nodes

font.title: Font
font.desc: Extended font list for mind maps
font.placeholder: Search font. You can also press Enter to add input fonts directly

other.desc1: After activation, it will check if a new version is available when the plugin starts. If your network cannot access Github, it is recommended to disable this option

imageHosting.desc1: After activation, all images will be uploaded to the image bed
imageHosting.tip1: Please first improve the configuration information of the drawing bed
imageHosting.desc2: Fill in the corresponding upload interface address based on the graphic tool you are using
imageHosting.desc3: Name of the form field when uploading images
imageHosting.desc4: Response structure when uploading images. Please refer to the detailed description for more information:

html.filenameFormatDesc:
In addition to fixed names, variables can also be used, enclosed in {}. Available variables are as follows:

1.{notename}: The current file name without extension;

2.{date}: Current date in YYYY-MM-DD format;

3.{time}: Current time in HH:mm:ss format;

4.{datatime}: Current date and time in YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss format;

5.{date:Format}: Specify date/time format, e.g.: MM-DD HH:mm, reference: Format specification;

6.{random}: Random string with 6-character length;
